title: The Best Champion You Should Buy
body:
Hello Everyone !
I Want to ask you about the best champion in the game.
In My opinion : the best champion is (Zed) because of his strong attack and his high speed
But it not depends on the champion price...for example Ashe cost 450 IP but she is strong !
so who do you think is the best champion.and who should i collect IP to get it.
That's all .
Tell Me Your Opinion !.

replies.body: The best champion to buy is the one you have the most fun playing.

There is no such thing as a "best champion".

You appear to be new, so you will probably think any AD assassin is incredibly OP for a while. Zed is actually pretty useless aside from his zeroskill2kill-button ult.

yes you can say that i am a beginer but i am on my way to be professional.
but i want to know what is the best Selection for anyone
http://champions.pickban.com/ 
here i found that many players voted to Shen.!
what do you think about it?
I am afraid i cannot even understand that. Maybe start by becoming a professional practitioner of english?
tell me what you can't understand !

I am a Beginer
I want to know the champion which players have choosed him !
that all i said
tell me what you can't understand

Everyones just gonna say their main / favourite champion.

Since I'm first I'll start: {{champion:240}}

I know but some players will agree on the same champion !
Kled Is one of my best 5 champions !
